nodes.text: The Rifle Worlds was a medium-sized quadrant located near the middle of the Hapes Cluster. In total, the quadrant contained ten inhabited star systems and at least one native sentient species, the Mairans. The quadrant was also intersected by four different hyperspace lanes.

The Rifle Worlds, which were named for an attempt by the region to secede from Hapes, were settled primarily during the "industrial period" of Hapes and became the primary manufacturing center of the Hapes Consortium, which the Worlds' locals resented deeply.
